tracks.title: Neon Dreams
tracks.lyrics:
**Verse 1:**
Lost in the **neon glow** tonight
City lights are burning bright
Dreaming of a *digital* paradise
Where the pixels dance and roll the dice

**Chorus:**
Neon dreams, electric skies
Synthwave beats that *hypnotize*
In this **cyber wonderland**
Take my digital hand

**Verse 2:**
VHS static fills the air
Retro futures everywhere
Chrome reflections on the street
Binary hearts that skip a beat

**Outro:**
Neon dreams forever shine
In this [virtual world](https://example.com) of mine

tracks.title: Electric Nights
tracks.lyrics:
**Verse 1:**
Dancing through the *electric maze*
Neon shadows light the way
Lost in rhythm, lost in time
Every beat's a **paradigm**

**Chorus:**
Electric nights, we come alive
In the glow we *feel* so right
Pulse of [energy](https://example.com) so bright
These electric nights

**Bridge:**
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
Consectetur adipiscing *elit*
Sed do eiusmod **tempor** incididunt

tracks.title: Synthwave Sunset
tracks.lyrics:
**Verse 1:**
Purple haze across the sky
Synthesizers **harmonize**
Retrowave memories collide
In this *sunset* paradise

**Chorus:**
Synthwave sunset, colors blend
Digital dreams that *never* end
In this **vintage** future land
Time slips through our hands

**Verse 2:**

Consectetur *adipiscing* elit
Ut labore et dolore magna
Aliqua [nostrud](https://example.com) exercitation

tracks.title: Digital Rain
tracks.lyrics:
**Verse 1:**
Green cascades of *coded* light
Falling through the **endless** night
Matrix dreams and cyber storms
Binary rain in digital forms

**Chorus:**
Digital rain, wash away
All the *glitches* of today
In this **virtual** domain
Dancing in the digital rain

**Bridge:**

Amet consectetur *adipiscing*

tracks.title: Chrome Reflection
tracks.lyrics:
**Verse 1:**
Mirror worlds of *silver* light
Reflections dancing through the night
Chrome surfaces **gleaming** bright
In this cyber satellite

**Chorus:**
Chrome reflection, see yourself
In this *digital* wealth
Shining through the **virtual** stealth
Chrome reflection of our health

**Outro:**
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
Consectetur *adipiscing* elit
